website_summaries.verdict: A reasonably-priced dog food topper brand that includes 5 ingredients or less, and dogs will appreciate the addition of tasty shredded meat and veggies to their normal food.
pros: Only 4 ingredients: chicken, carrots, potatoes, and peas
Good choice for dogs avoiding food allergies
Simple shredded meat and tiny veggie bites
cons: Picky eaters may try to eat around the veggies

customer_reviews.title: Do not waste your money on this item.
customer_reviews.text: This gets an extra star because my dog liked it. That being said, it's straight up plain chicken in a little bit of water. I wish I would've paid more attention to what I was buying because I got ten ounces of chicken for more than what 3lbs of frozen skinless chicken breasts would've cost me at Walmart. Save your money and cook plain chicken for your dog.
customer_reviews.author: jb4513

customer_reviews.title: Best of the best
customer_reviews.text: My little girl loves this food!! We’ve tried all the flavors but this beef one is her absolute favorite. It looks appetizing even to me. It looks and smells like pot roast-amazing! These are great bc we have to “bait” her crunchy food or she won’t eat it. She is SUPER picky & doesn’t accept any “dog” food or treats (not most human ones either). The other wet foods have so many other ingredients and I didn’t really feel good about feeding it to her. This one contains exactly what it says on the front of each flavor. It’s a beautiful thing 💕💕💕
customer_reviews.author: CLMAAM

customer_reviews.title: Really...1 ingredient. Chicken!
customer_reviews.text: Thank you for creating this!!! My maltese got a bacterial intestines problem and medication and home cooked chicken is all he can have till he gets better. But I give him this also. When i peel open the lid, I air it out for a minute because its been freshly sealed. I break it up n it's really only white meat chicken! I'm 1 happy momma!!!
customer_reviews.author: dawn,new york

customer_reviews.title: Shredded chicken perfect for older dog who has chewing difficulties.
customer_reviews.text: I give this shredded chicken to my 201⁄2 year old dog each morning. She love's it. She has had dental work done that makes chewing difficult and this has been a great choice for her.
customer_reviews.author: Hoptown Gal

customer_reviews.title: smaller than thought
customer_reviews.text: these are smaller than the regular ones and contains water. Although, my dogs ate it, one each wasn't enough, even topped on the regular cesar wet dog food. So beware and plan accordingly. The price is too expensive for me to consistently feed this to my dogs. although the cats loved the chicken too before being chased off by the dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Rhyanna DeTuathana

customer_reviews.title: She loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My baby girl loves this stuff. She's a 12 lb Doxie, so I give her a half container on top of her Eukanuba for her evening meal. Sometimes she gets pouty and I have to give her some with her breakfast kibble. Heck, these look good to me. For those complaining about the amount, it's a topper for the kibble. These simply crafted Cesars are not supposed to be for a meal by itself. It's quick, easy and all natural ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: Little Gee

customer_reviews.title: Competitive price per ounce... and Simple!!
customer_reviews.text: My pup loves it - if you calculate per ounce v other limited ingredient toppers, it’s less AND no fancy fillers that my dog is sensitive to. Helps tremendously with topping the ONE brand of kibble I could find that she’s not allergic to - REALLY glad to have found this in Chicken & Chicken w/ Carrots & Beans - SIMPLE!!
customer_reviews.author: CWms

customer_reviews.title: Very dry food - no moisture at all
customer_reviews.text: This dog food is listed as a topper. I am assuming this means to put over dry food. I am not complaining about the food itself. I am saying this is not a good topper food. It is very dry and no way can you mix it with dry food. I use my fingers to break up the chicken and I put either water or chicken broth over it. There is absolutely no moisture in this food. In defense I will say the chicken looks delicious and smells great, exactly what a chicken breast would look lie if you cooked it yourself. My dog likes it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My dog loved it.
customer_reviews.text: My 14lb. Cockapoo needed to eat only chicken and rice for a couple of weeks. I saw this product and thought to take a chance. She loved it! It's really only chicken and is just the right amount for one meal. It's expensive for the amount, at WalMart it's $1.48 a serving! And a serving is small. But for a temporary situation like hers, it was fine. The pull off outer cover is simple enough, but the cover over the actual food product was difficult for me to pull off.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: NOT WORTH THE PRICE
customer_reviews.text: What a RIPOFF! I'm going back to making my 4 Yorkies organic meals. I thought this would help with my busy schedule....NOT!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Foster

customer_reviews.title: My doggy loves this food
customer_reviews.text: My dog is very picky and unfortunately his stomach is very sensitive. I tried all different types of expensive food and he always goes a day or two without eating. That was very normal for him. Ever since I bought this food he rates everyday. I mix it in with his dry food and he finishes the whole plate sometimes wanting seconds. He was never really a big eater but since I bought this food he is crazy for it! I know this isn't a full meal and only use it to top his dry food but he eats the whole thing.
customer_reviews.author: StephanieSL93

customer_reviews.title: laughable
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this product a negative -100 I would. Awful, awful, awful. I actually laughed at how Mars has the nerve to sell this. I peeled back the beautiful foil top and was SHOCKED...LOL. Each bowl, a lot of packaging, has 3 tablespoons full of food. RIDICULOUS!!! I really had to laugh at how stupid these companies think consumers really are. I have a nine (9) lb Shih tzu. I need to give her THREE!!! Never again...like WOW!!!
customer_reviews.author: JoAnn

customer_reviews.title: Dog preferred!
customer_reviews.text: When I got my new dog, I wanted to find the food he preferred as well as the one I found best for value and nutrition. I tried several, including the one I had used for many years for my late dog; however, this one was his favorite and it met all of my standards as well. He loves it. I mix it with his dry food since it is a bit much all by itself. He devours his dinner and smacks approvingly. This is the food we will use in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia S. Burgess

customer_reviews.title: Number One for Lucky..he’s voted! 👍
customer_reviews.text: I like the portion sizes. I also like the different flavors for Lucky. I’m sure they get tired from having the same thing everyday! Lucky gets one serving in the morning and another post afternoon walk. Our five boys are grown and now it’s time for Lucky to have some special dinners.
customer_reviews.author: gramsdaley

customer_reviews.title: You can make this yourself & save $$$$
customer_reviews.text: Our dog does like the 3 different flavors we purchased. These are extremely small portions per container. To make this at home : : canned chicken in water, drained & rinsed : : finely dice 2+ vegetables of choice : : combine all together / / optional: consult your vet regarding addition of his/her recommended vitamins etc. : : serve the desired portion : : refrigerate remaining in tightly covered container.
customer_reviews.author: Edwin K. Margulies

customer_reviews.title: Only good stuff
customer_reviews.text: My dachshund, Bree, LOVES THIS CHICKEN flavor. I just wish the cases were much larger.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dog loves it but there’s not enough in each tray!
customer_reviews.text: My Yorkie loves these! I also like that there’s only six (not five like the package claims) ingredients. However, there’s only a small amount in each tray. My 8lb. Yorkie can easily eat three of these in one sitting. For the price, there should be more.
customer_reviews.author: Mimilee

customer_reviews.title: Pay for the Convenience
customer_reviews.text: Hey, you can cook chicken yourself for a lot less than $16/lb, but these sure are convenient. The quality is very good, and they're packaged in a way that lasts a long time without refrigeration. I have one dog who has lost all her teeth, and she loves eating this, it has a nice soft consistency thanks to the natural juices. Keep a few on hand for emergencies.
customer_reviews.author: David E. Brahm

customer_reviews.title: Great Dog Food!!
customer_reviews.text: my puppy loves the flavors. We could not get him to eat any dog food until we found Little Ceasars Simply Craft. He likes the chicken best-it actually looks like a can of peoples chicken...if you put a little mayo in it& slapped it on some bread i bet you wouldn't know the difference-NOT that I would do that. All the packages have fresh looking veggies. Great for my puppy!!(
customer_reviews.author: D.L. Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Hmmmm OK
customer_reviews.text: So my puppies really like this “topper”, however, I will go broke buying enough. There is approx 2 Tablespoons in each cup and only receive 10 cups. I have 2 pups, feeding 2x a day 😥😥. Food does have a waxy white ingredient that I thought if I put into micro it would turn to gravy. No. The waxy stuff did concern me and still have no idea what it was. Will not buy again
customer_reviews.author: Debra C

customer_reviews.title: Purchased for my mini pin Chihuahua mix (Trouble
customer_reviews.text: Has a very pleasant aroma very delicate texture has a very very slight amount what appears to be chicken fat mixed into it which makes it extra appealing to my dog, it seems to be almost if not human quality. I'm sorry that it's very expensive more so than even can chicken for humans 3 oz is over $3 that's a dollar an ounce I'll have to double-check but I'm pretty sure canned chicken for humans is less than that! No I did not taste it so I don't know about the flavor,
customer_reviews.author: Mark A. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Cedar Simply Crafted chicken meal has been a blessing to my dog and me
customer_reviews.text: I have a VERY FINICKY dog who will only eat this product or me making human meat So it's a very welcoming product that doesn't mess with his tummy He even liked the container and used it as a you He plays with it better than some dog toys
customer_reviews.author: Brenda L Congdon

customer_reviews.title: Daisy Loves Simply Crafty Ceasar Chicken😋
customer_reviews.text: Our Daisy is a shih tzu. We have tried her on different brands of foods and have been met by different reactions. But she really loves the Simply Chicken. We have to order it from Amazon or Chewy bc we can't hardly find it in the major shopping centers anymore. Thank you for putting out a great product that our dog loves!❤️
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Key

customer_reviews.title: Picky Dog loves!
customer_reviews.text: Our 10 lb. Mr. Baxter is very picky when it comes to any wet food. Cesar Simply in any of the chicken flavors he will gobble up with his kibble! It is a staple dog food in our home.
customer_reviews.author: Peace Frog Gramma

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: My dog is a very picky eater but seems to like these. They are quite small though. He seems to finish one and still want more. He is only 8 lbs. The price is pretty good for 10 of them.
customer_reviews.author: Squid466

customer_reviews.title: Very good food, very small portion.
customer_reviews.text: This looks like shredded chicken and vegetables. I think it might taste good to me. My dog loves it. What I don't like is the amount that's in the plastic container. It looks like maybe a tablespoon of food. Your dog would have to eat several cans for a meal. What it does serve nicely for is a topping for regular dog food.
customer_reviews.author: Carole Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Dogs say "Num num num"
customer_reviews.text: This is my dogs most favorite treat of all time! I feed other wet food (Rachel Ray) and have dry out at all times, so I use this as a treat. I actually split one tub between my two small dogs (and they're small tubs) so it's special for them. They absolutely love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ate It Up
customer_reviews.text: First time presenting this mixture to my yorkie. Never ate the ingredients other than the beef and chicken, and he literally scarfed it up. Totally happy that I'm adding some nutritious food to his kibble. I'm happy, as he is too!
customer_reviews.author: JohnRascal

customer_reviews.title: Almost to good
customer_reviews.text: This product looks, smells great! My dog loves them! I gave them only 4 stars because after eating one of these my dog won’t eat anything else for 3 days, every time. Grr. So unfortunately I won’t be buying any more,they are just that good !!!
customer_reviews.author: Terrie

customer_reviews.title: My puppy loves it
customer_reviews.text: Not what i expected thought the package would be bigger. Very little in the small bowl. But my dog loves it. Does it come in a bigger container?
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Arrington

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: One Star because my fur baby has been sick since the first container. Also, containers have only a tiny bit in them. Mostly plastic and foil to pill back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Your dog will love you even more
customer_reviews.text: There's definitely not enough food in this container to be considered a meal. That being said, my dog loves this stuff! I give it to him as a special treat every so often.
customer_reviews.author: Heather M

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love this chicken!
customer_reviews.text: My Yorkie and Chorkie love this food. Very small cups of cooked chicken (white meat). I mix with the hard food and they actually eat all their food now! And I’ve tried all brands of soft food.
customer_reviews.author: MLM1

customer_reviews.title: Not Sure
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 VERY picky eaters and putting a little of this on top of their food works sometimes. I've found that if I take one piece and hand feed it over their bowl, they tend to eat more after they've had a sample but if I just put it in the bowl, they ignore it.
customer_reviews.author: Andreams

customer_reviews.title: GREAT , MY DOGS LOVE IT,!
customer_reviews.text: My dogs Love this flavor better than any other. It is rather expensive,l usually pay 98cents a carton when I can find stock.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon  Cruze

customer_reviews.title: Not what was expected.
customer_reviews.text: Didn't receive what we expected. The amount of food in each container was minimal, and looked more like a topping to put on a fuller meal, even for a very small dog.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Picky Pup but she lives this!
customer_reviews.text: Our chihuahua, Bella is a picky eater. She loves this. Our local store literally only puts out 10 of these at a time. We just ordered more here and it’s cheaper and Bella never has to settle!😊
customer_reviews.author: Deborah D.

customer_reviews.title: mouse sized portion
customer_reviews.text: Ridiculously small amount of food for the money. I used this as a topper to kibble because there is no way this is dinner for my dog-a 18 lb wire fox terrier. She liked it-but I won't buy this again
customer_reviews.author: one girls opinion

customer_reviews.title: Saving money ordering them here!
customer_reviews.text: Picky little guy likes it and eats it so that’s what he gets and saving money buy ordering them here.
customer_reviews.author: william h.

customer_reviews.title: Its easy for me to get the stuff
customer_reviews.text: My dog like this food they are not following my order put packages and boxes at the side door
customer_reviews.author: Dianeokrongley

customer_reviews.title: Dog approved.
customer_reviews.text: I am assuming the flavor is 5 stars, at least the dog seems to approve! There is enough variety to keep her from getting bored and the small containers are easily stored.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Martin

customer_reviews.title: don't expect a lot
customer_reviews.text: Certainly not worth the money. The dog food was of questionable quality - unedible tendonous and gristle and the packaging is very deceptive. It appears half full. They weren't kidding in calling it a "topper" It certainly is not really dog "food"
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: My little furbaby loves this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Please note that this isn't a balanced meal. It is an add on or a treat. As long as you keep that in mind this is a treat your furbaby should love it too.
customer_reviews.author: pabeader

customer_reviews.title: Packing error? Beef flavor rip off.
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves these, but the last 2 times buying this flavor they only sent 1 meal not 10 like the description says. This is the second time in a row ordering this specific flavor and only receiving 1 instead of 10. The first time I thought I had misplaced the whole box because I could only find 1. I purchased 4 other flavors and they all arrived as boxes of 10. So buyer beware, probably don’t order this beef flavor if you are expecting 10 meals for your dog to arrive.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Densmore

customer_reviews.title: For my picky eater
customer_reviews.text: This is the first dog I have ever gotten that is such a picky eater. At 2pounds she cannot afford to be. I keep trying different foods. So far so good with this and a little sprinkle of powder cheese.
customer_reviews.author: E. Durham

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love these
customer_reviews.text: Shocked my dogs love this. I haven’t been able to find a wet dog food until I decided to try this as they are used to my homemade chicken and rice I just wish they sold in cases
customer_reviews.author: SippinOnWaterfalls

customer_reviews.title: CESAR SIMPLY CRAFTED Wet Dog Food, 1.3 oz. Pack of 10
customer_reviews.text: Our Chihuahua Loves these Caesar Packets. The price is a little higher than I like but our Dogs are like our Children, so they deserve a good Food. I will continue to purchase these for our Family Pets. I will purchase these again
customer_reviews.author: Hammercl

customer_reviews.title: The Dog Loves it
customer_reviews.text: Looks and smells like people food, great quality, few ingredients, but expensive.
customer_reviews.author: njacacia

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love it!
customer_reviews.text: We have an 8 pound yorkie and he loves this topper for his dry food. One container has about 3 tablespoons so he gets 1tbs in each meal. Just enough to make his meal special. He likes the chicken only, doesn’t care for the veggie mix.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Small with less meat
customer_reviews.text: The price is more but there is less meat. However, my dog loved it (because it seems like people food?).
customer_reviews.author: Shiratha

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: MY LITTLE DOGGIE LOVES THESE DINNERS. I MIX WITH HER REGULAR DOG FOOD. HER VET OK THIS BRAND TOO.
customer_reviews.author: Linda L. McLean

customer_reviews.title: Panfie loves these.
customer_reviews.text: Well, I didn't actually taste it myself but my doggie, Panfie, loves this plus the plain Chicken flavor ones.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: My fur baby love this! And it smells delicious!
customer_reviews.text: My fur baby loves this! She had quit eating almost anything. I was searching for something she would eat. This smells good to me and she eats it no problem!
customer_reviews.author: lisa

customer_reviews.title: My dog love’s it
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this. It’s too bad there is very little in the containers. I know it’s only for a topping. But at times that’s all that he wants to eat. Wish it was in bigger containers they should have that option
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Perreira

customer_reviews.title: Small package Big price
customer_reviews.text: Just plain chicken Boil your own Teeny tiny amount of chicken at that 😳
customer_reviews.author: D. Henry

customer_reviews.title: MY PICKY DOG WILL EAT THIS
customer_reviews.text: I have tried every wet food there is for my adopted dog. Tried Cesars Simply Crafted food and my dog loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Kaplan

customer_reviews.title: Food that my pupies do mot eat
customer_reviews.text: The product is good but my dogs will not eat cut up wet food. They will smell it and walk away Reason for only one star? I want to cancell order and not able to. I fo mot want to buy something that I have to give away. I want this order cacelled Thank you
customer_reviews.author: leonor 6538@ gmail . com

customer_reviews.title: to small
customer_reviews.text: i read that one of these per day for every 10 lbs. my dog is 10 lbs she would starve with this small amount. vel told me my dog needs 1/2 cup 2 times a day. so that would be about four of these. WOW
customer_reviews.author: Mae

customer_reviews.title: to much filler
customer_reviews.text: not as good ss the chicken that is all chicken this one has mostly filler and the dogs eat around the filler vegetables unlike the chicken they eat the whole thing. not a good value.
customer_reviews.author: Dreric

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this food small portions so I mix it with other things sometimes but it’s the best by Cesar
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Can Early!!
customer_reviews.text: Can Early!!! Amazing during these difficult times of COVID--19. Package was in perfect condition as usual. Five stars for Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: L.Brittain

customer_reviews.title: Expensive
customer_reviews.text: Kind of expensive, but my pup likes them. I use it to top his dry food. Lots of variations/flavors.
customer_reviews.author: Ronni

customer_reviews.title: GREAT flavor!
customer_reviews.text: My 2 yorkies give this a paws up. They gobble it up & usually lick the plate clean.
customer_reviews.author: Margie S. Long

customer_reviews.title: Availability
customer_reviews.text: My little Chiweenie loves this food , hard to find so I looked al Amazon ,wow surprised to find it , only food she will eat !
customer_reviews.author: Nutty shopper

customer_reviews.title: My picky dog likes it
customer_reviews.text: My dog is so picky and this is the only dog food he will eat. Its a little less expensive than buying it in the grocery store where I paid $1.50 each.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Made at home better
customer_reviews.text: It’s easy if you buy the chicken and made at home!!!
customer_reviews.author: YanyDiaz

customer_reviews.title: She ate it!! "Wow". All of it too.
customer_reviews.text: I finally found a dog food that my very picky Teacup Chihuahua will eat. Praise the Lord!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Gail Walker

customer_reviews.title: A good mix in for your dogs main food
customer_reviews.text: This is a good quality addition to the Caesar lineup. We use this as an addition to our dogs usual Caesar food. It's a good mix of chicken and veggies and smells good enough for human consumption. Love this
customer_reviews.author: Charles Webb

customer_reviews.title: Bad odor..
customer_reviews.text: I must say... As soon as I open one it smelled really bad . I’ve never smelled anything like it before. I was afraid to feed it to my dog. Never purchasing it again.
customer_reviews.author: Vanny

customer_reviews.title: My two dogs love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I add hot water and let it set for a few minutes for a warm meal for them.
customer_reviews.author: Loving Life

customer_reviews.title: Real chicken.
customer_reviews.text: My dog likes this food and buying it on Amazon is easier than searching for it in stores.
customer_reviews.author: Judith A McKinstry

customer_reviews.title: Yorkipoo in love
customer_reviews.text: Yorkiepoo loves this! This is a great natural food that can keep him healthy
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Holley

customer_reviews.title: I don’t have to encourage Oscar to eat.
customer_reviews.text: Oscar won’t eat his meal without his salad on the side. He loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Wanda J

customer_reviews.title: Picky dog loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Too Expensive for the amount of food you get . But my very pickey dog loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Marie

customer_reviews.title: MY SHIH TZU REALLY LIKED THIS DOG FOOD
customer_reviews.text: MY SHIH TZU REALLY LIKED THIS DOG FOOD. THEY STATE ONE A DAY, HOWEVER, MINE EATS 2 A DAY. I LIKE THE INGREDIENTS, BUT WISH THE CONTAINER WAS BIGGER. I WILL DEFINITELY BUY AGAIN AND HOPE IN THE FUTURE THEY WILL HAVE BEEF.
customer_reviews.author: Josey

customer_reviews.title: Definitely buy them
customer_reviews.text: Everything looks normal and my little Chihuahua is picky and looovvvveees these. I feel better giving these other than canned food. Seems better for them.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Cesar Simply Crafted Wet Dog Food
customer_reviews.text: Our dogs love this, especially the beef with purple potatoes.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Ramsey

customer_reviews.title: Just like home
customer_reviews.text: My dog enjoys this very much. Seems to be of good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but good
customer_reviews.text: It was way too expensive For the tiny container but my dog loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Liz F.

customer_reviews.title: Best topper ever
customer_reviews.text: This is the BEST topper for dogs - all chicken - no runny gravy - my picky pups love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: pamela

customer_reviews.title: Decent food that with only one ingredient.
customer_reviews.text: I cannot comment on the flavor since I am not eating it, our dog seems to like it.
customer_reviews.author: PRZ

customer_reviews.title: Yum
customer_reviews.text: Pups loved this. Wish it came in larger containers, very expensive this was!
customer_reviews.author: l kempel

customer_reviews.title: Delicious to my dog!
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this food. It’s smells terrible to me, like canned tuna fish. However, my dog loves it and gobbles it down. I mix it in with her dry kibble and it seems to be delicious to her.
customer_reviews.author: C. Harris

customer_reviews.title: Finally a food my little guy will eat!
customer_reviews.text: My picky little chihuahua LOVES this dog food! He has picked at everything I’ve tried until I tried this. Only these packets from now on!
customer_reviews.author: Deb in AZ

customer_reviews.title: Finicky Eater
customer_reviews.text: My puppy is very finicky . I saw this item at the store and gave him some and after that this is something he'll eat and that makes me happy. I can't find it in the stores like I used to. I saw it one Amazon and the rest is history.
customer_reviews.author: Anita I. Cowan

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff but awfully small
customer_reviews.text: Our Maltese loves it, but 1.3 oz for a buck thirty is a lot of money for a little product
customer_reviews.author: George K. Zane

customer_reviews.title: Cesar is really healthy for all dogs!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have a Teddy Bear Dog. I mix Cesar with her dry food every day. She loves this all the time!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lindi

customer_reviews.title: Only Received One Tub.
customer_reviews.text: My pup loves this food. However, I only received one tub and not a pack of 10. I reached out to the seller and have never heard back. Highly disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: T. Bellati

customer_reviews.title: The chicken is hard pieces like it's compressed
customer_reviews.text: Carrots potatoes and peas.The chicken is hard pieces like it's compressed, my dog spits out the pieces of chicken on the floor. it's not like real chicken you make. Does not like it.
customer_reviews.author: joan j.

customer_reviews.title: Small amount of food
customer_reviews.text: I have a large dog (100 pds). I buy wet food to mix with the dry food. These containers are very nice looking,, but I have to use two for my dog.
customer_reviews.author: LPD

customer_reviews.title: Convenient, **Use only as a TREAT or an addition to dry food.. NOT ENOUGH NUTRIENTS ALONE
customer_reviews.text: Liked the white chicken and no by-products. Should put on label that nutrition is not adequate by itself !!!!!
customer_reviews.author: ANNEGAIL22

customer_reviews.title: My lil girl loves it!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: It is a little pricey but my dog loves it and there really isn’t a million bad chemicals in the food. Water and chicken. I like that.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Ryder

customer_reviews.title: Small but good it seems
customer_reviews.text: I didn't realize how tiny the portion was. It seems yummy but not enough alone for my Maltese. I mixed in other dog food with this and my 🐕 loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Lorie

customer_reviews.title: small portion
customer_reviews.text: portions were small and for the price I didn't think it was worth it. I'd rather buy a whole chicken from Costco for $4.99 and cut it up for her every other day.
customer_reviews.author: Celeste

customer_reviews.title: 2nd time
customer_reviews.text: Great value, I use these on top of food like cause there’s only few ingredients and no wheat gluten.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberlind kirbach

customer_reviews.title: Chihuahuas love it.
customer_reviews.text: Using it as an add-in with kibble. Our chihuahua loves it. Able to get 2 or 3 meals with one pkg. Economical.
customer_reviews.author: Glenda Wiedermann

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My pug loves this I wish they were they were large. He are five at one time. Big hit!!!
customer_reviews.author: Leah S Klein

customer_reviews.title: Simple, clean and dog loves it
customer_reviews.text: Dog loves it. Simple ingredients, easy to use, no stink or mess. Picky eater so I just mix this with dry kibble (NUTRO LID) and he eats it all up. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: HONEST REVIEWS

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love the Ceasars dry chicken toppings.
customer_reviews.text: This item always sells out at my local grocery syore glad Amazon seems to always gave it in syock.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: CESAR SIMPLY CRAFTED Wet Dog Food
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend CESAR SIMPLY CRAFTED Wet Dog Food, 1.3 oz. Pack of 10. My dog loves the Chicken flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Perfetti

product_meta.title: CESAR SIMPLY CRAFTED Wet Dog Food, 1.3 oz. Pack of 10
product_meta.description: Flavor Name:Chicken, Carrots & PotatoesDogs love the great taste of CESAR Wet Dog Food. CESAR SIMPLY CRAFTED Complements Tubs were designed to give dogs a simple and tasty meal complement. Add our real chicken and wholesome, quality-ingredient recipes to any complete and balanced meal as a healthy topper. SIMPLY CRAFTED is designed with no artificial colors, flavors, fillers, or preservatives, and is always served in convenient tubs with no-fuss, peel-away freshness seals, making meal-time easy. The CESAR Brand is always looking to unlock more shared moments of joy between you and your furry friend.
feature_bullets: Contains Ten (10) 1.3 Oz. Tubs Of Cesar Simply Crafted Wet Dog Food Cuisine Complement With Chicken, Carrots, Potatoes, And Peas
Made With 5 Ingredients Or Less For A Wholesome Addition To Any Meal With More Flavor And Less Filler
Our Recipe’S First Ingredient Is Chicken—A Favorite Among Furry Best Friends
No Artificial Colors, Flavors, Fillers, Or Preservatives—Just Simple Wholesome Ingredients Your Dog Will Love
Convenient Tubs With No-Fuss, Peel-Away Freshness Seals That Are Easier To Open, Making Mealtime Even Easier
Serve As A Healthy Topper To Any Complete And Balanced Meal—And Make Their Day
